::Zardus/Striker::

Zardus growls as a shot hits him, sending him stumbling back. He growls again 
as Striker lands near Sniper.

"Enough." Zardus says, raising his comm-link to his mouth, "Devil, 
Bloodystrike, report to my coordinates. There are some maximals here..." He 
says and turns back toward the maximals.

"I suggest you retreat!" he says, firing another shot from his launcher at 
the two maximals.
